fullContent: Home› ShootingMasked Special ForcesBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenMasked Special Forces is a multiplayer first-person shooter game with a myriad of customization options. The game puts you in the shoes of a commander in the battle arena. As a talented warrior, team up, strategize, and take down the opponents one by one. Access to an array of upgradable weapons, armory, kill messages, and victory dances on the main menu. Ultra-realistic visuals and smooth gameplay will give you a feel at least as captivating as an iconic console game. In this fast-paced action game, you get to dive into an intense battle immediately. Or you can customize your gaming experience thoroughly before the gunfight. Select between available rooms, or create your own by selecting between detailed maps. Masked Special Forces is a game that stands out among all shooter games online thanks to its lifelike details. The game has been loved and played by thousands since its initial release. So, it happened to be a pioneer of a whole sequel with six different FPS games. If you are wondering about other games on the Masked Forces, we highly recommend you try your hand at Masked Forces Zombie Survival.      We invite you to a virtual shooting experience. Start playing with other players all around the world, or keep reading this post about Masked Special Forces to prepare for the battle. Learn about the armory, game modes, HUD and more about the game. If you need further guidance on how to get better at FPS games, we have picked the best advice from our top gamers.⚠ Content AdvisoryThis game includes mature elements such as intense action, strong language, or violent sequences.
